lines.text: [Bob's attempt to seduce Billie is rudely interrupted by Vera]
What can I do for you?
Oh, Bob, honey, you're just so strong and and big and brave. I don't know what I'd do without you.
Look, if I bother you, go somewhere else.
Oh, cut it. Cut it, I said!
Look, nobody talks to me like that. I'll kill that dame!
Oh, this stinkin' swamp water stinks!

[digging for diamonds]
Ouch! I busted the only nail I had left!
